title: Pixel do not disturb still not working for starred contacts after November 20 security patch
content:
Update: 
After the Nov 20 security update, it's still status quo, nothing is fixed for this issue.

Problem: 
Starred contacts still did not ring when dnd is turned on.

Comments: 
The alternative solution recommended by others which is to turn on "allow repeat callers" is not the right solutions.

Why would I want to block a call from the same caller just once within a 15 min duration? 

Why does this feature even need to exist in first place. 

Solution:
Unless Google give an option of how many times you can block from the same person before a call gets through otherwise this function is redundant in my own opinion.
